Event.name: Burying
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> places a <fen>Theme</fen> under a surface (often the ground) into a <fen>Goal</fen> location.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The suspect</fex> <t>buried</t> <fex name="Theme">his gun</fex> <fex name="Goal">in the ground</fex> <fex name="Time">while fleeing the police</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally buries the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The pirate</fex> <t>placed</t> the treasure on the island.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that is buried.
<ex>The pirate <t>buried</t> <fex name="Theme">the gold</fex> under the tree.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Source
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the initial location of the <fen>Theme</fen>, before it is buried.
<ex>Her mother <t>buried</t> the seedlings <fex name="Src">from the smaller pot</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Path
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any description of a trajectory of motion which is neither a <fen>Source</fen> nor a <fen>Goal</fen> expresses the frame element <fen>Path</fen>.
<ex>The roots should be <t>buried</t> <fex name="Path">through the provided grate</fex> in order to provide support as the plant grows.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Goal
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Goal</fen> is the location where the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up.
<ex>The suspect <t>buried</t> the gun <fex name="Goal">in the ground</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Any expression which describes a property of the placing action which is not directly related to the trajectory of the <fen>Theme</fen>'s motion expresses the frame element <fen>Manner</fen>. Descriptions of speed, steadiness, grace, means of motion, and other things count as <fen>Manner</fen> expressions.
<ex>The suspect <t>buried</t> the gun <fex name="Manner">hastily</fex> behind the fence.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> indicates the degree to which the burying occurs.
<ex>Make sure you <fex name="Degr">completely</fex> <t>bury</t> it, otherwise it will be found eventually.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies any <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>I <t>buried</t> the money <fex name="Depictive">uncounted</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> is an act whereby the <fen>Agent</fen> achieves the burying of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex>I finally <t>buried</t> it <fex name="Mns">by slowly pushing it into the top layer of soil</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Result</fen> of the burying.
<ex>The cables are <t>buried</t> invisibly under the soil.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Duration</fen> is the amount of time for which the <fen>Theme</fen> stays in the <fen>Goal</fen> location.
<ex>If you <t>bury</t> it there <fex name="Duration">for extended periods</fex>, it may begin to degrade.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> indicates where the burying occurs.
<ex>It must have been <t>buried</t> <fex name="Place">south of this location</fex>, according to the map.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> that the <fen>Theme</fen> is buried.
<ex>She <t>buried</t> the book <fex name="Explanation">because she feared others would read it</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fen>Time</fen> is when the burying occurs
<ex>Smithers had <t>buried</t> the treasure there <fex name="Time">the night before</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Area
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Area</fen> is the general area where the <fen>Theme</fen> is buried.
<ex>They probably <t>buried</t> them <fex name="Area">around the property</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cotheme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Cotheme</fen> is buried along with the <fen>Theme</fen>
<ex>The treasure was <t>buried</t> <fex name="Cotheme">along with a parchment describing where it came from</fex>. </ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Distance
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE is any expression which characterizes the extent of motion of the theme into the ground.
<ex>I <t>buried</t> the seed<fex name="Distance">several feet deep</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Speed
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Speed</fen> is the rate at which buring occurs.
<ex>Smithers <t>buried</t> the bone <fex name="Speed">quickly</fex> and went to look for his dog.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition:
<def-root>A non-animate force which buries the <fen>Theme</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cause">The tornado</fex> <t>buried</t> most of the structures in this area.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An action that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to accomplish by performing the burying action.
<ex>They <t>buried</t> the vase in the ground <fex name="Purpose">to protect it from looters</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Beneficiary
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Beneficiary</fen> derives a benefit from the occurrence of the burying event.
<ex><t>Bury</t> the gold <fex name="Beneficiary">for me</fex> and when we dig it up, you can have half.</ex></def-root>
